introduction.text: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is the best way to protect yourself online. It adds an additional layer of protection beyond passwords.

disableConfirm.title: Disable Authenticator (2FA)
disableConfirm.description: Do you confirm removing the current authenticator from your account ? Once removed, your account may be at risk.

enabledSuccessMessage.title: Authenticator (2FA)
enabledSuccessMessage.description: Authenticator is now enabled on your account

disabledSuccessMessage.title: Authenticator (2FA)
disabledSuccessMessage.description: Authenticator is now disabled, be aware your account is at risk

qrcodeStep.title: Scan
qrcodeStep.introduction: Start by scanning the following QRCode with your authenticator.

codeStep.title: Verification
codeStep.label: Code
codeStep.introduction: Input the code generated by your authenticator in its 30s validity.

summary.introduction: Authenticator (2FA) is already enabled on this account.

passwordSettings.title: Password
passwordSettings.introductionText: Your password will expire on the {{date}}, you may change it ahead of time. Once your password is expired, you will be asked to change it on your next sign in.

successMessage.title: Password updated
successMessage.description: Your password has been updated and is valid for 90 days

webAuthnSettings.title: Security Keys (WebAuthn)
webAuthnSettings.introductionText: You may use security keys with <webauthn>WebAuthn</webauthn> as an alternative way to authenticate from your devices without using your password.

successMessage.title: Security Key created
successMessage.description: Your account is now configured with a new security key for this device

deleteMessage.title: Security Key revoked
deleteMessage.description: Your security key has been revoked and cannot be used anymore

revokeModal.title: Revoking security key
revokeModal.content: Do you confirm your action to revoke the security key ?

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.introductionText: The following table lists all active sessions for this account. You may revoke suspicious active sessions remotely.

deleteMessage.title: Session revoked
deleteMessage.description: The session has been revoked and will not be allowed accesses anymore

revokeModal.title: Revoke session
revokeModal.content: Do you confirm your action to revoke the session ?
